      • getNamedOutput

        protected org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.MultipleOutputs getNamedOutput()
        Returns the first named output found. This is designed as a convenience method for the typical case where there's only a single named output. If there are multiple named outputs, the one returned is essentially random and the caller should therefore use the getNamedOutput(String name) version.
        Returns:
        MultipleOutputs the configured named output

      • getDefaultNamedOutput

        protected org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.MultipleOutputs getDefaultNamedOutput()

      • getNamedOutput

        protected org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.MultipleOutputs getNamedOutput(String name)

      • getAvroNamedOutput

        protected org.apache.avro.mapreduce.AvroMultipleOutputs getAvroNamedOutput()
        Returns the first avro named output found. This is designed as a convenience method for the typical case where there's only a single avro named output. If there are multiple named outputs, the one returned is essentially random and the caller should therefore use the getNamedOutput(String name) version.
        Returns:
        AvroMultipleOutputs the configured Avro multiple output

      • getDefaultAvroNamedOutput
